title: Can you please share the process for Bulk Booking? : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Ticket Booking Queries : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
You may click on the 'Corporate' tab visible under the region/city or click
here
. The Corporate team shall reach you out within 24 to 48 working hours post evaluation.
P.S: You will have to book a minimum of fifty movie tickets & a minimum of twenty tickets in case of a non-movie to honor your request.
